name: Utter Chaos
description: Saying "hello" to your neighbor? You just might burst into flames, turn into an alien, or both. This mod adds a chance for random outcomes to every action in the game.
downloadWarning: This mod is just for dumb fun. You should NOT be using it in saves that you care about, because literally anything can happen at any moment (pregnancy, death, turning into a mermaid...). Due to the degree of randomness caused by this mod, it may make other mods behave unpredictably as well. Do NOT report any bugs to creators while you have this mod installed, because chances are, this is what's breaking things.
